Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.notification

Interface NotificationsPreference

All Known Implementing Classes:
NotificationsPreferenceImpl
public interface NotificationsPreference
This class is responsible for configuring notification preferences

  • Method Details

    • setSoundEnabled

      void setSoundEnabled(android.content.Context context, Boolean enabled)
      Sets notification sound enabled / disabled
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      enabled - true for sound enabled and false or null for sound disabled

    • isSoundEnabled

      boolean isSoundEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if the notification sound is enabled,
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      true if the notification sound is enabled and false if it's disabled. The default value is false.

    • setSound

      void setSound(android.content.Context context, Integer sound)
      Sets the notification sound
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      sound - The sound resource id. Null for no sound

    • getSound

      Integer getSound(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the notification sound resource id
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The notification sound resource id. Null will be returned if no sound was defined.

    • setVibrateEnabled

      void setVibrateEnabled(android.content.Context context, Boolean enabled)
      Define if the device will vibrate on notification receive.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      enabled - true if vibration is enabled and false or null if it's disabled.

    • isVibrateEnabled

      boolean isVibrateEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks the notification vibration definition
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      true if vibration is enabled and false if it's disabled.

    • setVibrationPattern

      void setVibrationPattern(android.content.Context context, long[] vibratePattern)
      Sets the notification vibration pattern. This will only have an affect if vibration is enabled.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      vibratePattern - The vibration pattern. Null for default OS pattern. An empty array will not change the current pattern.

    • getVibrationPattern

      long[] getVibrationPattern(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification vibration pattern.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The vibration pattern. Default is null.

    • setIcon

      void setIcon(android.content.Context context, Integer icon)
      Sets the notification icon
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      icon - The notification icon resource id. Null for default OS icon (android.R.drawable.sym_def_app_icon)

    • getLargeIcon

      int getLargeIcon(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification large icon.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The defined icon resource id. Default value is no icon

    • setLargeIcon

      void setLargeIcon(android.content.Context context, Integer icon)
      Sets the notification large icon
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      icon - The notification icon resource id. Null for no icon

    • getIcon

      int getIcon(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification icon.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The defined icon resource id. Default value is android.R.drawable.sym_def_app_icon

    • setLightsEnabled

      void setLightsEnabled(android.content.Context context, Boolean enabled)
      Configures notification lights
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      enabled - true for lights enabled and false (or null) for lights disabled.

    • isLightsEnabled

      boolean isLightsEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if the notification lights are enabled.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      true if the lights are enabled and false if they are disabled. Default is false.

    • setLights

      void setLights(android.content.Context context, int[] lightsPref)
      Configures the notification light preferences. This will only have an affect if notification lights are enabled.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      lightsPref - The lights preferences. Null for default OS light. An empty array will not change the lights preferences definition.

    • getLights

      int[] getLights(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined notification lights preferences.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The defined lights preferences. Default is the OS default lights preferences.

    • addFlags

      void addFlags(android.content.Context context, Integer flags)
      Defines the added flags for the notification intent
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      flags - The added flags. Null for Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP.

    • getFlags

      Integer getFlags(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the defined added notification intent flags.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The defined added flags. Default is Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP

    • setGroupByAttribution

      void setGroupByAttribution(android.content.Context context, boolean enable)
      Defines if notification will be grouped by the attribution
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      enable - true for group by attribution or false otherwise

    • setNotificationChannelId

      void setNotificationChannelId(android.content.Context context, String channelId)
      Sets the sdk notification channel id
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      channelId - The notification channel id

    • getNotificationChannelId

      String getNotificationChannelId(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the sdk notification channel id
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      Returns:
      The notification channel id

    • setIconColor

      void setIconColor(android.content.Context context, Integer color)
      Sets notification icon color / icon background color
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context.
      color - The background color for the notification icon

    • getIconColor

      Integer getIconColor(android.content.Context context)
      Gets the notification icon color / icon background color value
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
